Title: Private Resort
Writer: Gordon Mitchell (screenplay), Ken Segall (story), Alan Wenkus (story), Gordon Mitchell (story)
Actors: Rob Morrow, Johnny Depp, Emily Longstreth, Karyn O'Bryan
Plot: The story of two adolescent boys who are guests at a Florida resort for the week-end. Their only interest is, of course, chasing girls, but fate has much more in store for them.
